name: CalendarAgent
description: Calendar and task management agent. Checks schedules, creates/updates/completes tasks, and manages reminders via Vikunja.

skills.name: Calendar Management
skills.description: Look up events, check schedules, and manage calendar entries
examples: Do I have meetings this week?

skills.name: Task Management
skills.description: Create, update, complete, and delete tasks and to-do lists
examples: Create a task to review the PR
What tasks are due this week?
